DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine use bone compaction process ( osseodensification ) ( Densah™ bur : Versah Osseodensification Company™ ) prepare dental implant site , human subject , result increase bone-ridge width , increase compact bone outer wall prepared site , dental implant stability .
DOC.brief_title: Dental Implant Stability When Using Densah Bur™ Bone Compaction Process Prepare Dental Implant Sites
DOC.detailed_description: The propose project observational , case-series study . The investigator anticipate enrol 40 study subject . Treatment Procedures : Following initial treatment planning discussion dentists patient regard dental treatment option , patient opt dental implant place approached discuss participation current study . Before entry study , Investigator authorize member investigational staff explain potential subject aim , method , reasonable anticipated benefit , potential hazard study , discomfort may entail . Subjects informed participation voluntary may withdraw consent participate time . They inform choose participate affect care subject receive treatment condition . Subjects tell alternative treatment available decline take part present study refusal prejudice future treatment . Those patient willing participate schedule initial follow-up dental implant visit SOD . At baseline visit study outcome data collect ; include : 1 ) measure bone-ridge width , implant site preparation ( drill ) ; 2 ) intraoral photograph prepare opening ; 3 ) dental implant torque reading obtain ; 4 ) ISQ measure initial dynamic development osseointegration ( formation direct interface dental implant bone ) time . The ISQ measurement collect three six-weeks post treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females 2 . Ages 1880 year age 3 . Missing least one tooth . 4 . Capable give informed consent 1 . Patient pregnant female 2 . Patient smoke 5 cigarette per day 3 . Patient history alcoholism drug abuse last 5 year 4 . Patient uncontrolled hypertension diabetes 5 . Patient malignant tumor 6 . Patient daily dose steroid 7 . Patient history chemotherapy radiation last 12 month 8 . Patient immuno supressed 9 . Patient titanium allergy 10 . Subject homeless person
